title: Africa: the land and its people. No. 1
brief_description: Magazine items: Johannesburg Art Gallery, home of many works of the seventeenth century Dutch and Flemish schools, the French impressionists and the work of many African artists. Work of the South African Institute for Medical Research in the preparation of snake-bite antidotes manufactured from venom extracted from snakes.
